prompt: Replace the text on the main front sign (the one in sharp focus) with: 'I LOVE YOU WITH ALL MY HEART, NO BUTS.' Keep the same all-caps distressed white font, line breaks, alignment, and black wood block background. Do not alter any of the surrounding blurry signs.
knowledge_prompt: The goal is to edit only the readable foreground block. The replacement text must preserve the worn, slightly chipped stencil style and the multi-line stacked layout so it still looks like a printed wooden quote sign sold in a store. The other signs in the background should remain untouched and out of focus.
